There was opened to the minds precious light that should have been a blessing to them, but God could not do many mighty works in that conference because of their unbelief. There should have been at that meeting patient study of the Scriptures with fasting and earnest prayer before God that we might see eye to eye. This is the only way. There can be no safety in contention of spirit in investigating points of truth, as it must be done in the spirit John had when he said, "He must increase, but I must decrease." More of Jesus, less of self. And as the investigation continues in the spirit of Christ it will be at last all of Jesus, none of self. 
                                                                           518
